So here it is, folks — the real face of Tata’s “premium” Safari experience.

You pay ₹25–30 lakhs for a flagship SUV and what do you get?
 A garage slot.
 Zero courtesy car.
 50+ days of service hell.
 No empathy, no accountability — just a glorified scrap metal
